##========================================================================
## NAME
=pod

=head1 NAME

DiaColloDB::XS - XS utilities for DiaColloDB

=cut

##========================================================================
## SYNOPSIS
=pod

=head1 SYNOPSIS

 ##========================================================================
 ## PRELIMINARIES
 
 use DiaColloDB::XS;
 
 #... nothing to see here, move along ...

=cut

##========================================================================
## DESCRIPTION
=pod

=head1 DESCRIPTION

The DiaColloDB::XS package provides optimized XS subroutines
for some compile-time DiaColloDB operations.
If it is available on your system,
it should be implicitly used by the higher-level wrapper methods
if and where appropriate.  Otherwise, compatibile pure-perl fallback methods
should be used.

=cut
